title: One of Steam's biggest battle royale games gets the coolest weapon I've ever seen in new update
contents: If I asked you to name the best battle royale games on Steam, I'm sure many of you would say PUBG: Battlegrounds first. Call of Duty Warzone and probably Battlefield 6, thanks to its RedSec mode, may come quickly after. Apex Legends is still trucking along too, bringing that Titanfall flair to the genre. However, I'm not sure many people would mention Naraka Bladepoint, NetEase's surprisingly enjoyable (and popular) wuxia BR. With slick movement, a great death mechanic, and enormous snakes that gatecrash your battles, it's a brilliant take on free-for-all fighting and its latest update offers an exciting array of new additions. Read the rest of the story... contents: Dear players, The servers of NARAKA: BLADEPOINT will be suspended for maintenance from October 22nd, 2025 at 23:00 (UTC) to October 23rd, 2025 at 04:00 (UTC). Rift Traversal New Chapter: The Aquila's PastA new chapter unfolds as the \ replaces \. Or salvation... 1. Map Area Changes1) Added Empyreal Village area2) Modified building structures in the Plumed Castle main district.3) Modified Thunder Isle area 2. In-Game Quests1) Added in-game quest - \. In the basement of Holoroth, help the Charioteer clear attacking enemies within the time limit to obtain Drunken Fire Crates.2) Added in-game quest - \. Return the lost kasaya to its owner. Head near the Charioteer and wait for quest progress to fill, then submit the kasaya to obtain Drunken Fire Crates.3) Original \ quest replaced with \. Capture and escort the prince's carriage to the station to obtain Drunken Fire Crates.4) Added Empyreal Village to monster stronghold areas. You must now interact with them only by cleansing corruption to claim rewards.4) Added rarer Advanced Ore scattered across map corners. Some Advanced Ore is hidden underground and can be detected with Treasureseer.5) Added the Aquila's Might - Can be acquired from the Drunken Fire Crate that is granted by the Holy Blaze Tree.Effect: Enhances the wielder's Grappling Hook and Mole Hook, converting Vertical Grappling Strikes into Eagle Glide. During the effect, allies within range receive an Attack bonus. At set intervals, enemies within 100m of the Hero with Aquila's Might are made visible. Aquila's Might lasts 300 sec. 4. Resource Adjustments:1) Greatly increased Drunken Fire Crates and map resources. 5. Combat Item Adjustments1) Treasureseer can now detect Advanced Ore. Detected Drunken Fire Crates and Advanced Ore will be marked. 6. For the new rift, Tranquil Path requires Preparation Score below 450,000; Perilous Path requires Preparation Score between 240,000 and 1,750,000; Doomed Path requires Preparation Score above 700,000. 7. New Limited-Time Gameplay: \This place blurs the line between reality and illusion, filled with mad ravings and insane whispers. This gate is only available to the team that finds the real Li Huowang. Players can choose to escape immediately or return to Holoroth. Whatever you do, beware of the fake "Li Huowang"!3) When the countdown ends, \ will be filled with toxic fog. Players can exit \ through the \ located within the hospital. 2. title: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT Update – June 18th, 2025
contents: Dear players,The servers of NARAKA: BLADEPOINT will be suspended for maintenance from Jul. 8th, 2025 23:00 (UTC) to Jul. 9th, 2025 04:00 (UTC). We suggest you log out in advance and enter the game again after maintenance is complete.The details for this update are as follows:Brand New ContentI. The brand-new treasure hunting mode, Rift Traversal, is now available (Trailblazer Season) Ancient deities stir. Rifts tear the world apart, and heroes converge upon this calamity.Your goal: scavenge lost supplies, defeat opponents, and escape safely through Rift Gates.Whatever you extract from the rifts enters your personal out-of-game storeroom and becomes resources for your next match. 1. Basic Rules(1) Collect lost Relics across the fractured lands of Holoroth in Rift Traversal.(2) While treasure hunting, you must deal with monsters and beware of prowling "counterparts". Bring your Divine Armory or travel light, but rebirth means losing everything you carry.(3) Find Rift Gates on the map, awaken the Aegis Tree, restore yin-yang balance, and escape with your plundered treasures intact. 2. Out-of-Game Systems(1) PreparationPurchase and equip supplies in the Preparation interface before entering rifts. You'll spawn into matches with your prepared loadout. (2) StoreroomStore supplies extracted from matches in your storeroom, where you can organize and sell these resources. (3) New Assist Gear "Mole Hook"Switch between Grappling Hook and Mole Hook assist gear during Preparation or at Rift Dealers in-game. Both consume hook items.a. Stealth Movement: Use on the ground to burrow and move stealthily. While burrowed, you can organize your bag, drop items, and even search for treasures underground.b. Aerial Rush: Rush in any direction, even skyward.c. Leap: Press dodge while burrowing to jump over obstacles and gain brief invulnerability at the cost of Stamina.d. Underground Moves: Horizontal strike charges toward crosshair, vertical strike performs Uppercut Slash. You can charge underground, waiting for the right opportunity to burst forth! 3. In-Game Mechanics(1) Spawn: After Preparation, you will spawn randomly on one of the map's two sides.(2) Resource Searching: Interact with in-game objects to search for resources. Interactables have highlight outlines.(3) Precious Resources: Drunken Fire Crates are precious, limited resources on the map. They are more likely to contain high-quality Relics.(When opening some Drunken Fire Crates, you must seize the moment and use counters to weaken their seal meter.)(4) Weather:a. Blizzard: You build Coldness during blizzards. Your Rage is continuously drained when you reach a certain amount of Coldness. Find Campfires for warmth. Blizzards also spawn frozen treasures across the battlefield.b. Sandstorm: Crouch to hide in the dust during Sandstorm for ambushes and retreats.(5) In-Game Quests:As matches progress, quests activate across the map.a. Contract: Defeat specific targets like the heathens at Yushan Ruins, the horse bandits at Plumed Castle, and the shadow guards at the City of Tang per quest requirements.b. Valiant Challenge: Reveals your position once picked up, but scouts for enemies within a certain range every once in a while. You have to survive for a certain period of time.c. Revenge: Deal 1,000 damage to your teammate's killer and your party will gain 1 additional rebirth (Requires one of your teammates to have been eliminated).d. Flag: Escort your party's flagbearer, and head for the target Spirit Well zone. Defend the area until progress reaches 100% to complete the quest and receive Drunken Fire Crates.e. Cargo Escort: Capture and escort the Golden Roc to the station to obtain Drunken Fire Crates.f. Clear: Clear out Evil-Ent strongholds to receive Drunken Fire Crates.g. Guard: Protect the target boss from being defeated within the quest time.h. Challenge: Collect 2 Rune Stone items from clearing Evil-Ent strongholds to unlock boss challenges. Defeat the boss to receive Drunken Fire Crates.(6) CavesMore than 10 cave types await across each match, but you’ll need keys to unlock them. Keys have limited durability, and the amount used varies depending on the vault's and map's difficulty.Special cave keys can be purchased from Rift Dealers. Keys with special descriptions cannot be extracted from matches.(7) EscapeAs matches progress, escape points—Rift Gates—gradually activate across the map.Different Rift Gates have varying limits, activation times, and durations. Gates close when their duration ends.Beyond regular Rift Gates, gates with special conditions include:a. Weight-Limited Gates: Requires Relic Bag weight below a certain thresholdb. Triggered Gates: Requires triggering the Rift Gate Guides located in the West Wing, Forecourt, and East Wing of Plumed Castle, in that order. Once used, they enter cooldown and cannot be used immediately by other parties.c. Quest Gates: Requires completing any questd. Hidden Gates: Requires purchasing specific items from Rift Dealers...

title: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT Update – June 5th, 2025
contents: Dear players, The servers of NARAKA: BLADEPOINT will be suspended for maintenance from June 4th, 2025 23:00 (UTC) to June 5th, 2025 04:00 (UTC). We suggest you log out in advance and enter the game again after the maintenance. The details for this update are as follows: Brand New Content I. Showdown Season 3.0: Windstorm 1. New Hero: Justina Gu The Herald stirs. Ancient shadows awaken. Three legendary blades cross paths for the first time. What alliance could bring together Justina Gu, the Saint Eagle of Holoroth, and the Wolf King of the Prairie against impossible odds? The new Hero Justina Gu has now joined Showdown. Her blade weaves frost and shadow, cleansing corruption from every realm. 2. New Boss and New Chapter Something sinister awakens in the silent Empyreal Village. Beneath twisted totem poles, a woman clad in wolf pelts emerges from the darkness... Three hundred years of desert storms could not bury Sirius' fury—Huanyue, one of the elders of the Herald, walks among mortals once more. The brand new Showdown series officially begins, with the new chapter now live! //Dev Notes: We're streamlining our storytelling approach and update cadence. While keeping the same 4 stages per 2 seasons, we're now delivering a steady 2 stages each season for better pacing. Plus, starting this season, every new stage's Easy mode is unlocked from the get-go; no requirements, no level gates. You can all enjoy the Showdown saga and face our latest bosses right away. 3. Trial Heroes and Team Support (1) When teaming up with other players, you can select 2 heroes displayed in your teammate's profiles and their corresponding loadouts during the preparation phase. As teammates, they can also directly configure loadouts and provide these support heroes during the preparation phase. System trial heroes are also available when not in a team. (2) Initial trial attempts are 2 per week. Upgrade your Showdown season level to unlock more attempts. (3) Provide support heroes for Popularity points, Souljade Fragments, and Scented Sachet rewards. (4) This feature is available in Normal/Hard stages, Doom mode, and Topaz Enigma Domain. (5) Trial attempts and reward progress reset every Thursday at 4:00 AM. 4. New Showdown Journey Quests Starting with , each new Showdown season will feature exclusive Journey Quests. The existing beginner's Journey Quests will still be available. How to Unlock: After completing the beginner's Journey Quests, participate in Showdown to automatically unlock the Journey Quest of the current season. Quest and Rewards: Within the limited event period after the season begins, complete any Showdown stage daily to claim daily rewards. Complete 7 days of quests to receive generous Journey rewards: powerful Souljade sets and precious Showdown resources—Flux Jade Shards. 5. Nirriti's Ruins and Yama's Abyss Reset Yama's Abyss, Nirriti's Ruins, and season challenge progress and rewards have been reset. Take on Yama's Abyss and Nirriti's Ruins this season for Splendor Treasure Choice Gift, Showdown Seal, Flux Shard, limited-edition avatars, and much more! 6. Brand-new Gameplay (1) New "Element Surge" Souljades. Max out your elemental meter and unleash devastating power. Works with Ice, Thunder, and Poison builds. (2) Bow and Musket now support Quick Counter. (3) Ranged weapons now feature the "Cloudpiercer" mechanism. Build up your Deadeye meter through shooting, then enter Deadeye mode for advanced techniques. Bow and Musket lead the charge with weakness exploitation and signature Deadeye skills. (4) Potential levels have been reset. We've overhauled all existing potential effects and added new ones for Element Surge and Deadeye, providing a wider range of combo selections! 7. Sense Level Redesigned as Showdown Level Sense levels for Showdown Souljades and heroes are now unified as "Showdown Level", and we're merging Potential levels into it too. Your maximum Sense level of Souljades in Might Season will be partially carried over and converted to your Showdown Level. levels 1050 and below don't transfer, but every 5 levels above 1050 becomes 1 Showdown Level (i.e., maxed Lv. 1120 becomes Lv. 15). Earn Showdown XP through weekly Showdown quests or Fatigue usage to upgrade your Showdown Level. Higher levels mean more potential points and massive attribute boosts. //Dev Notes: The new Showdown Level system removes barriers for newcomers. Additionally, it eliminates the tedious grind when experimenting with different Souljade builds. No more wasted drops on upgrades, and there will be more recasting materials. 8. title: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT Update – April 17th, 2025
contents: Dear players, The servers of NARAKA: BLADEPOINT will be suspended for maintenance from Apr 16th, 2025 23:00 (UTC) to Apr 17th, 2025 04:00 (UTC). We suggest you log out in advance and enter the game again after the maintenance. The details for this update are as follows: Brand New Content I. New Showdown Gameplay: Tempered Inferno In the Soul-forging Abyss hidden in the Shadowjade Mine, the "Chaos Furnace" that once refined the legendary weapons of the Herald used to be alight day and night. However, under the mad scheme of Omnius, a drastic change occurred. After Omnius's plan to revert the Five Phases back to primordial chaos was foiled by the heroes, some formless chaotic Qi escaped and seeped into the Chaos Furnace. A bursting of energy flooded out because of the imbalanced Five Elements within, attracting countless evil spirits into action. Thus, a battle to protect the furnace began. In this crisis, the heroes used Chaos Stones crafted by the Chaos Furnace to forge Curios imbued with the powers of Yin and Yang. These Curios then became their weapons to slay demons and eradicate evils. However, as the energy of the Chaos Furnace continued to leak, the furnace fire gradually weakened. The heroes who sought more Curios could only wait for the Five Phases True Qi to return to balance on the Morus Isle before they could once again awaken the Furnace. Defeat waves of enemies, claim numerous prizes, and revel in the power of the Curios! II. New Showdown Item: Curio Each hero has two Curio slots: Yin and Yang. One Curio can be equipped in each slot. 1. Crafting Curios Chaos Stones, acquired in Tempered Inferno, can be used to craft Curios. There are two kinds of Curio crafting: Random Craft and Targeted Craft. : produces a random Curio of the current season, and builds XP to boost its Crafting level. : Once you have raised a given Curio to Lv. 1, you'll be able to choose to craft that Curio using . At the end of the season, Curios will be reclaimed, but Crafting Levels will be retained. In following seasons, players with Crafting levels will be able to craft Curios from past seasons. From time to time we will hold Rerun Events for players who missed out. During the season, each Curio Crafting level you upgrade will increase the season progress by 1. Season progress rewards include Flux Shards, Curio crafting materials and more! 2. Curio Stars Curios can be smelted into Chaos Extract, a resource used in leveling up Curios. Each level gained grants an attribute of a random quality and type (that the Curio does not already have). A Curio can have at most 4 attributes. 3. Awakening Curios and Harmonic Balance Extreme Curio raised to 3-Star level can be awakened with Tempered Essence. If successful, the Curio gains random awakened attributes (these differ between Curios). Failure will result in the loss of the lowest-quality or lowest-level attribute. You can still raise the Curio's stars to get a new attribute. Each failure boosts your awakening chance across all Curios. With both an awakened Yin and Yang Curio, you unlock for all your heroes (whether you have the Curios equipped or not), boosting your Luck by 2,000, and your team's by 1,000. Boosts can stack. Lasts until Tempered Inferno reopens next season. III. Limited-time Event: Hunting Grounds Event Duration: Apr. 17, 2025 Update - May. 21, 2025 20:00 (UTC) Event Rules: 1. During the event, hunt Scorpions, Lizards, Squirrels, and Rats in Survival Modes to get Hunting Grounds Chests. 2. Each player can get up to 2 Hunting Grounds Chests per match, up to 6 per day. 3. Use a Hunting Grounds Chest for a chance to get Golden Light Outfit Choice Gift, Golden Light Weapon Choice Gift, Golden Light Party Choice Gift, Golden Light Accessory Choice Gift, Gold, Floral Dew, Splendor Treasure Choice Gift, Jade Disk, Splendor Treasure Shard Choice Gift or Floral Dew Shard. During the event, earn Flame Gems by opening Stashes in Survival modes or through Casual Modes and Showdown. You can acquire up to 400 Flame Gems per week through these modes. 2. Tap the Hunt button on the event page to randomly receive ores of the same type. Collect five of the same ore to claim corresponding rewards. 4. Claim 50 extra Flame Gems upon first entering the event page each week. The weekly Flame Gems limit and extra Flame Gems reset every Wednesday at 20:00 (UTC). V. Limited-time Events: Infernal Reckoning Event Duration: Apr. 17, 2025 Update - Apr. 31, 2025 20:00 (UTC) Event Rules: 1. Gain Omen Coins by completing quests during the event. Omen Coin can be redeemed for great event rewards. 2. Complete each day's Daily Quests to receive bonus rewards. 3. There are 5 groups of Challenge Quests, each available in turn at different times. Complete quests to claim plentiful rewards. 4. The rewards are redeemable till May 07, 2025 at 20:00 (UTC). Please redeem the rewards...

title: Celebrate the Spring Festival and more!
contents: Greetings Forerunners! It is the dawn of a new year and with it comes new updates for NARAKA: BLADEPOINT. Here’s a preview of what’s to come in our update on January 20th. New Hero: Lannie Starting the New Year with our latest hero, Lannie, an acrobat and conjuror who's faced tragedy but seeks to rewrite her fate on Morus Isle. Rescued by a stargazer, she now fights to claim the Mask of Immortality and alter her fate. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/ebfe0a75606ab27368d2a67c6ddc9cb09b5b70ec.jpg In combat, Lannie uses her special cloth to knock back enemies, stealthily vanish, or make swift leaps, sending adversaries airborne. Her ultimate move unleashes the power of a silk ball, delivering massive damage through techniques like Mighty Smash and Aerial Strike. Drawing from the ancient art of Chinese acrobatics, Lannie's combat style is a tribute to Chinese cultural heritage, designed to bring extra festivity to the Spring Festival celebrations. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/7038b86c9fd2996289f2a14825c998907de7d8da.png New Spring Festival Events Log in daily to receive new and exciting rewards from our Spring Festival celebration. Inspired by the God of Wealth, the special Wishing Event invites you to visit Fairyland Penglai, make heartfelt wishes before the deity, and earn rare in-game items to bring great fortune and prosperity for the year. Additionally, new gameplay allows you to collect red envelopes and win abundant in-game items, ensuring a holiday full of surprises and blessings! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/80669d926bf2816d43725a1289511791ad91e4d8.jpg {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/a5d37158d6e52b23b518320c8a57022b63643857.png Collaborations and More for 2025! Our ongoing collaboration with the King of Fighters (KOF) remains a hit, featuring iconic characters and exclusive outfits! This event introduced outfits like Athena × Kurumi, Shermie × Viper Ning, Mai Shiranui × Matari, and Iori Yagami × Akos Hu, each featuring highly faithful character designs and new skill effects that inject passion and excitement to the battlefield. 2025 promises even more collaborations and innovations. Get ready for a year packed with crossover madness! All our successes and milestones would not be possible without all the love and support from you, our players. We sincerely extend a heartfelt thank you to you all for continuing to light up the battlefield and blazing your path to glory. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/5bdefbcefa7a12c3e6adb1c11b8cc2d7a19929fc.jpg We look forward to an action-packed and exciting year with you Forerunners. See you on Morus Isle! The NARAKA Team

title: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT Update – Jan 21st, 2025
contents: Dear players, The servers of NARAKA: BLADEPOINT will be suspended for maintenance from January 20th, 2025 at 23:00 (UTC) to January 21st, 2025 at 04:00 (UTC). We suggest you log out in advance and enter the game again after the maintenance. The details for this update are as follows: Brand New Content I. New Hero: Lannie {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/8c17f26039248670c6f70f7d334dc73b54b9c867.png Life, they say, life, they say, means ya gotta work all day. But life for Lannie ain't like that, and she is never going back. Learn a trade and secure my future? No way, no way! Work hard and climb life's ladder? No way, no way! They tell you lies so you'll work for free. But when it's late morning and you're slaving away, who's living like a god? That's right, me! II. Season Exclusive: Spring Lantern·Hua {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/6bec80d86d1aa217131ef68241a8e1674366a6a0.png 1. The Spring Lantern·Hua is priced at 360 Gold. Open for a chance to obtain rewards like Lannie Extreme Outfit and the Polesword Extreme Skin . 2. While you have the outfit equipped, there will be a running astral deer effect when you defeat enemies. Cannot be Imprinted: Moving fast or attacking will trigger an exclusive carefree immortal effect. 3. Equipping Polesword Extreme Skin changes the special effect of Counterstrike Combo and Souljade . After a charged attack, the amber shatters to unlock the Tiger's Fury form, which then reconstructs itself once you are out of the combat. 4. Minimum Guarantee: (1) Players are guaranteed to receive at least 1 Red (Extreme) reward during the process of opening at most 100 Treasures. This can be triggered multiple times. Red (Extreme) rewards will not repeat until all of them have been obtained. (2) Legendary Cosmetic Minimum Guarantee: Within the first 25 Treasures opened, you are guaranteed to get either a Hero Outfit or a Weapon Skin. Subsequently, within every 25 Treasures opened, you are guaranteed to obtain a Legendary cosmetic that you have not yet unlocked. This guarantee can be triggered up to 14 times. (3) Wishing Legendary Reward: If you draw an Extreme cosmetic, you can set a Legendary cosmetic which will be guaranteed when you draw a Legendary cosmetic next time. Times of guarantee can stack, but you can only set 1 cosmetic each time. If the Legendary Cosmetic Guarantee and Wishing Legendary Reward trigger simultaneously, priority is given to the Wishing Legendary Reward cosmetic and will reduce the number of remaining times that the Legendary Cosmetic Guarantee can be triggered by one. 5. Spring Lantern·Hua 50% Discount Voucher The first 10 Spring Lantern·Hua that you buy will benefit from a 50% discount. This discount cannot be stacked with discounts from other discount vouchers. After 10 Spring Lantern·Hua have been purchased, subsequent Spring Lantern·Hua will return to their standard price. 6. Spring Lantern·Hua will be available on Jan. 21, 2025 at 04:00 (UTC)! After the server opens, players can preview content early, but the Spring Lantern·Hua will remain locked until the specified time. The Star-Collection unlocks at the same time as the Spring Lantern·Hua. III. mode content adjustment 1. New feature. Players in the same faction can't choose the same hero. 2. Slightly increased the capture rate of the Spirit Well. IV. Fairyland Penglai: Spring Festival Gameplay 1. Wealth God's Blessing The Wealth God has been added to the Seraphic Quartet. At the start of every hour and 15 minutes thereafter (UTC), the Grand Wealth God will descend on Fairyland Penglai, bringing Year of the Snake Grand Lucky Bags for all players. Additionally, spending Fu Characters at the Wealth God's Hat in Fairyland Penglai will invite the Golden Wealth God in the spender's name, offering Golden Lucky Bags for all players on Fairyland Penglai. Forming a Stack Up High team and collecting Red Packet Showers will provide additional boons. The rewards for the two types of Red Packet Showers are different. Wishing everyone good luck! 2. Fairyland Penglai New Year's Scenery The Fairyland Penglai is decorated anew to celebrate the coming festival. May you all enjoy good fortune and wealth in the Year of the Snake! V. Limited-time Event: Golden Spring Rising Event Duration: Jan. 21, 2025 Update - Feb. 26, 2025 20:00 (UTC) Event Rules: 1. During the event, players can get Spring Coins by opening Stashes in Survival modes or by completing matches of Golden Roc Escort mode or Showdown mode. Each match is split into two halves, with teams taking turns playing as the Attackers and the Defenders. 2. During the first half, the Attackers must capture the Spirit Well, then summon and escort a Golden Roc to the destination to destroy a Border Stele. The Defenders must prevent this from happening. 3. In the second half, the teams swap roles and compete again. Victory Conditions 1. After swapping sides, the targets and allotted time for the second half will be adjusted based on how well Attackers did in the first half. 2. If the second-half attackers can match the first-half progress within a certain time limit, they win; otherwise, it's a tie or loss. Others 1. When defeated, select a Soul Altar on the map to revive. 2. Once the Spirit Well is captured, two Golden Rocs will appear with different routes. The Attackers only need to escort one of them to the destination. 3. The game will enter overtime if the Attackers are still within range of the Spirit Well or Golden Roc when regular match time expires. 4. Once overtime is up, the game will end immediately. 5. Soul Lantern: Across the map, you will find Soul Lanterns that can be activated to restore your Armor, Health, and Rage. Additionally, they provide a temporary boost to your Attack and Melee Resist. You can access Create Party and other features from the former team lobby on this page. VI. contents: Dear players, The servers of NARAKA: BLADEPOINT will be suspended for maintenance from Dec 4th, 2024 23:00 (UTC) to Dec 5th, 2024 04:00 (UTC). We suggest you log out in advance and enter the game again after the maintenance. The details for this update are as follows: Brand New Content I. Showdown Season 2.5: Might Increased the max level of Sense to 1120. 1. New Hero Tessa has joined Showdown. A new hero, Tessa, has joined Showdown. Her smile alone is enough to win over the masses! 2. New Boss and New Enigma Domain A beastly roar echoes forth, and the arena begins to tremble! An earth-shaking showdown is about to unfold. Are you ready? New Enigma Domain is now available. 3. Nirriti's Ruins and Yama's Abyss have been reset. Season Challenge progress and rewards of Nirriti's Ruins and Yama's Abyss have been reset. Take on Yama's Abyss and Nirriti's Ruins this season for Peerless Treasure Choice Gifts, Legendary weapon skins, Flux Shards, limited-edition avatars, and much more! 4. Brand New Souljades and Potentials Introducing Lotus Souljades, with Ice, Thunder, and Poison Element combinations! Potential levels have been reset, and we have adjusted the effects of existing Potentials, while adding new Lotus-related Potentials, providing a wider range of combo selections! 5. Catch-Up Points Upon finishing a stage with at least 15 Fatiguecost, the Souljade reward targets you've failed to meet will be granted as Catch-Up Points. Spend 600 Fatigue to convert Catch-Up Points into Legendary/Epic Souljades or Carved Crystals. Catch-Up Points are not carried over from week to week, and are reset to 0 every Wednesday 20:00 (UTC) Newly added Hero Badge: Against All Odds, serves as a counter for the matches where you've earned Catch-Up Points. By upgrading the Hero Badge, you will get Carved Crystal, Souljade Fragment, Exhilarating Elixir, Flux Shards as rewards. //Dev Note: We have been closely monitoring the loot experience since the launch of Showdown mode. In this mode, luck significantly influences the results because the loot distribution is inherently random. So, when there is a significant disparity between the effort invested and the rewards received, it may lead to disappointment. We are introducing a new catch-up points feature to compensate for lower rewards when luck isn't on your side. title: New Hero Cyra Available on Oct 30th
contents: Happy Halloween, Forerunners! For this year’s celebration you’ll get to enjoy unforgettable events brimming with dance parties, exclusive themed items available only during this event, alongside new costumes and gameplay modes. Dive into a festive atmosphere filled with spooky surprises. For the first time, the event features culturally inspired Halloween-themed cosmetics, adding an exciting layer of diversity and style, alongside fresh gameplay modes that promise to elevate your adventure further. Here’s what we have to offer: New Hero: Cyra We will introduce Cyra, a former Temple of Light and Shadow priestess turned hero, on October 30 PT. Raised with a strong faith as an orphan, her beliefs were shaken after uncovering a dark secret involving her orphanage, leading to a dramatic awakening of her latent powers during a fatal ritual, where she lost her memory. Determined, she embarked on a quest, eventually reaching Morus Isle. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/ab73fc2b58954f5b5c102a2ac52a135c481b5ab2.jpg Cyra’s abilities include casting orbs that explode to heal allies or damage enemies, and the ability to control the timing and targeting of the explosions. Her ultimate skills allow her to levitate, shield herself, and alternate her attacks between healing light beams and damaging, blinding explosive orbs. With her intriguing backstory and versatile abilities, Cyra is poised to add a new layer of strategy and depth to the NARAKA gameplay experience. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/a4f82132d266c2569fb68feff5e3fb8bd7ddc6bd.png New Cosmetic: Peculiar Tales Throughout the event, players can unlock new cosmetics based on mythological figures, each with distinct styles. Currently available are Kurumi's Aoandon-inspired outfit and Zai's Lucifer-themed look, complete with an Ult Special Effect Accessory. Hadi's attire, influenced by Hades and featuring a transformation accessory, will be available alongside a richly detailed witch-themed Grappling Hook starting October 30. Additionally, a cosmetic based on YanWang will be unveiled soon. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/dfc5b9d4e7f337c3ec491a0f179e4d0e3c02fe3e.jpg New Gameplay on Fairyland Penglai Starting October 30th, Fairyland Penglai, our in-game 3D Lobby, will be revamped with a Halloween twist. It will be complete with thematic music, dance options, and seasonal activities, this engaging space invites players to mingle, interact, and revel in the holiday festivities. New Hungry Dragons Mode: We're refreshing the classic Snake Game mode - Hungry Dragons with a unique deathmatch twist where kills make your koi fish-shaped snake longer. Surviving the arena means dodging traps, utilizing tactical items for speed and skill recharges, and staying clear of large attacks. Growth brings power, but keep your lengthening tail safe. Stay alert! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/982d3541da491fbff86ac4c4440cdcb284b9ceb1.jpg

title: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT Update – Oct. 31, 2024
contents: Dear players, The servers of NARAKA: BLADEPOINT will be suspended for maintenance from October 30th, 2024 at 23:00 (UTC) to October 31st, 2024 at 04:00 (UTC). We suggest you log out in advance and enter the game again after the maintenance. The details for this update are as follows: Brand New Content I. New Hero: Cyra The chief Divine Healer, the Saint of Dawn. Cyra was widely considered a Lunazran treasure. Yet her former glory and good name were lost, replaced by biting criticism and cruel rumors. Some named her a heretic, others merely considered her insane. She cared little since the Light's blinding rays would dazzle them so. Cyra is ready to do whatever it takes, entirely unwavering in her quest to champion the Light. II. New Casual Mode The new Hungry Dragons mode is now available! Use whatever means you have at your disposal to defeat your opponents and make your dragon the longest one! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/974d7a8cd1869db849b61d401accd171e9c99e10.png Rules: You can queue for this mode Solo or as a Trio, but this mode is always a free-for-all, with a maximum of 12 people. Earn points by collecting Dragon Orbs (EXP items), defeating opponents, leveling up, and attacking opponents' tails. Attacking tails degrade the level and grants Dragon Scales (Upgrade items). EXP items provide EXP for leveling up and additional Rage. Reaching a higher level increases your maximum Health and Ultimates' attack range. Periodic AOE attacks will be triggered by mechanisms in the scene. Use Jump or Crouch to evade as appropriate. Winning Conditions: Players are ranked based on their total scores at the end of the match. Small Dragon Orb: +1; Large Dragon Orb: +3 Defeating a player: +15 Attacking the tail once: +5 Each level at the time of settlement: +10 In the event of a tie in final scores, the winner will be determined by comparing the players' Kill Score, Level Score, and Item Score in that order. Other Rules: Characters gain new powerful Ultimate Moves at Lv. 9 and Lv. 17. Hitting a mechanism in the battlefield with an Ultimate Move triggers resonance, causing an AOE attack. III. Season Exclusive: Aurora Treasure {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/36350327/ef7bb98bfcff981760fd36eb12171e0c639fe46f.jpg The Aurora Treasure is priced at 360 Gold. Open for a chance to obtain rewards like Cyra's Extreme Outfit and the Fan's Extreme Skin . While wearing , there will be a Shining Wings effect when you defeat enemies. While standing still and not in combat, a special effect will trigger - Six Wing Splendor. This effect cannot be Imprinted. Equipping changes the special effect of Quick Dash Horizontal Strikes and Souljade 's attack. Flowing water and fish effects will appear while charging attacks. Minimum Guarantee: Players are guaranteed to receive at least 1 Red (Extreme) reward during the process of opening at most 100 Treasures. This can be triggered multiple times. Red (Extreme) rewards will not repeat until all of them have been obtained. Legendary Cosmetic Minimum Guarantee: Within the first 25 Treasures opened, you are guaranteed to get either a Hero Outfit or a Weapon Skin. Subsequently, within every 25 Treasures opened, you are guaranteed to obtain a Legendary cosmetic that you have not yet unlocked. This guarantee can be triggered up to 14 times. Wishing Legendary Reward: If you draw an Extreme cosmetic, you can set a Legendary cosmetic which will be guaranteed when you draw a Legendary cosmetic next time. Times of guarantee can stack, but you can only set 1 cosmetic each time. If the Legendary Cosmetic Guarantee and Wishing Legendary Reward trigger simultaneously, priority is given to the Wishing Legendary Reward cosmetic and will reduce the number of remaining times that the Legendary Cosmetic Guarantee can be triggered by one. Aurora Treasure 50% Discount Voucher The first 10 Aurora Treasures that you buy will benefit from a 50% discount. This discount cannot be stacked with discounts from other discount vouchers. After 10 Aurora Treasures have been purchased, subsequent Aurora Treasures will return to their standard price. IV. Limited-time Event 1. Aurora Treasure with bonus Star - Collections Event Duration: Oct. 31, 2024 Update – Jan. 22, 2025 00:00 (UTC). Event Rules When opening Aurora Treasures, there is a chance to receive the Extreme Outfit, and the Legendary Outfit, . When you open an Aurora Treasure, there is a chance to obtain them as an additional reward. This chance increases as you open more. The Maximum chance is 100%. The chances for the 2 Star-Collections are calculated separately and do not impact each other. After getting a Star-Collection, the corresponding chances will then reset. title: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT Update – Sep. 24, 2024
contents: Dear players, The servers of NARAKA: BLADEPOINT will be suspended for maintenance from Sep. 23, 2024 23:00 (UTC) to Sep. 24, 2024 04:00 (UTC). We suggest you log out in advance and enter the game again after the maintenance. The details for this update are as follows: Brand New Content I. Alliance 1. In Quick Match and Ranked Mode (below the Asura rank), when teammates leave the battle early in a multi-player team, the last remaining player may use the "Alliance" tag in the Bag page to join forces with other players. If the requirements are met, the player initiating the Alliance will form a new team with other players for that match. The requirements for Alliance: Spend 7,500 Dark Tide Coins; The Alliance must be initiated before the fifth Shadow Corruption starts in the match; Each player can initiate at most one Alliance per match, and each match can only have a certain number of Alliances. The Alliance feature is disabled when fewer than 4 teams are left in the match; When you are in the Realm of Yang, the Alliance process will be paused; when the Realm of Yang ends, it will resume. When an Alliance is completed: You will exit the Ultimate state if you are in one when the Alliance is activated. When you successfully activate an Alliance, any active Bounty, Protection, and Valiant Challenge Quests relating to you or your alliance member(s) will be canceled. The current version allows Alliances of up to 2 heroes. II. New Events 1. Limited-time event: Alchemy Trials 1. Event Time: From Sep. 24, 2024 Update to Oct. 16, 2024 at 20:00 (UTC) Event Rules: During the event, earn Sparks by opening Stashes in Survival modes. Sparks are also obtainable through Showdown. You can acquire up to 300 Sparks per week through these methods. Tap the Mineralcraft button on the event page to randomly receive Crystals of the same type (consumes 10 Sparks). contents: Dear players, The servers of NARAKA: BLADEPOINT will be suspended for maintenance from Sep 11th, 2024 23:00 (UTC) to Sep 12th, 2024 04:00 (UTC). We suggest you log out in advance and enter the game again after the maintenance. The details for this update are as follows: Brand New Content I. Added the ability to block damage from ranged attacks for . II. Matari 1. Optimized the visual effects of the Ultimate when activated. III. Lyam Liu 1. Slightly reduced the pulling effect in the Ultimate 's teleportation move. Weapon Adjustments I. Single-edged Weapon 1. Optimized the gestures when charging for a new horizontal strike after the third move in a horizontal strike. Out-of-game Adjustments I. More Rewards for Heroes Assemble 1. Each prize draw in Heroes Assemble will now provide an additional 150 Hidden Treasure XP. 2. Added Cleanse Stones to the prize pool, and increased the quantity of Exhilarating Elixirs, Carved Crystals, random Legendary Souljades, random Epic Souljades, Legendary Rune Keys, and Rebirth Beads. 3. Removed Elemental Essences and Potential XP Bonus Cards from the prize pool. Showdown Adjustments I. Combat Adjustments 1. Optimized the physical collision effects at the Aegis-break stage of the . 2. Extended the duration of Lightning Spear in the Buried Giant stages. II. Hero Adjustments 1. Increased the transparency of the special effects for Yoto Hime's Martial Skill . III. Nirriti's Ruins Adjustments 1. Increased the Fatigue accumulation in Nirriti's Ruins. The increased Fatigue accumulation will provide additional rewards corresponding to the extra accumulation in areas 6 to 15. 2. Added a prompt about the attribute bonus level enhanced in on the stage selection screen. 3. Added the Anima Rings to the initial selectable Anima Rings in the preparation phase. When all Anima Ring types are activated, 5 of them will be randomly drawn. 4. Slightly reduced the number of Death Spores or Crimson Mist spawned in each stage when the or Omens are triggered. 5. Slightly increased the score added for each Dark Tide Coin pickup in the stages. 6. Adjusted the random rules for Nirriti Codex content. Now, you won't get the codex event that acquires if you have the , and vice versa. IV. Yama's Abyss Adjustments 1. Added a prompt on how to deal with the Moonbane's Eye in stages where the boss is the Matron of Yushan. V. Stage Adjustments 1. Adjusted the nodes corresponding to Fatigue accumulation and output in the Dangers in the Deep level. VI. Features Adjustments 1. As some players have not had the chance to see the notice that the old Recasting system will be removed, we are moving its removal date from September 12th to September 24th (UTC+8). VII. Showdown Battle-related Bug 1. Fixed an issue where the descriptions of some Anima Rings in Nirriti's Ruins contained and . 2. Fixed an issue where the Dark Tide Coins cost did not count to the Anima Ring in the Nirriti Codex. 3. Fixed an issue where the output of Carved Crystals and Shrouded Jades during the third and fourth Fatigue levels of some stages was lower than expected. 4. Fixed an issue that caused Vinemire's aggression to be lower at long distances. 5. Fixed the issue in Yama's Abyss Empyrean 2 where Omnius·Vortex (Real) might not immediately transform into Omnius·Void. Feature Optimizations I. Out-game 1. Optimized the logic for default equipment of new hero weapons. After a new hero is released, the system will prioritize equipping them with high-quality weapon skins that you already own. If there are newer skins of the same quality available, those skins will be equipped first. Note: If a player logs in after a long absence, a default weapon match will be generated for all heroes released during their absence. II. Keyword & Terminology Adjustments 1. "Vaporize" type Anima Rings have all been renamed to "HydroFlare" type. This adjustment is purely cosmetic. 2. The name of the item "Alchemical Crystallized Soul" has been renamed to "Alchemized Souls". This adjustment is purely cosmetic. 3.
